001package io.cyborgcode.roa.db.query;
002
003import java.util.Collections;
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.Map;
006import lombok.EqualsAndHashCode;
007import lombok.Getter;
008import lombok.ToString;
009
010/**
011 * Represents the response of a database query.
012 *
013 * <p>This class stores the result of a query execution, containing a list of rows where
014 * each row is represented as a map of column names to their respective values.
015 *
016 * @author Cyborg Code Syndicate üíçüë®üíª
017 */
018@Getter
019@ToString
020@EqualsAndHashCode
021public final class QueryResponse {
022
023   /**
024    * The result rows of the executed query.
025    *
026    * <p>Each row is represented as a {@code Map} where the key is the column name
027    * and the value is the corresponding data.
028    */
029   private final List<Map<String, Object>> rows;
030
031   /**
032    * Constructs a new {@code QueryResponse} wrapping the provided list of rows.
033    *
034    * @param rows the list of result rows (each a map of column names to values); must not be {@code null}
035    * @throws IllegalArgumentException if {@code rows} is {@code null}
036    */
037   public QueryResponse(final List<Map<String, Object>> rows) {
038      if (rows == null) {
039         throw new IllegalArgumentException("rows must not be null");
040      }
041      this.rows = Collections.unmodifiableList(rows);
042   }
043
044}
